OAT.trading

Class StrategyPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • OAT.event.Listenable
      • OAT.trading.Plugin
        • OAT.trading.StrategyPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataRequirer, Loggable, PrefNode<Plugin>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPredictor, AdverseStop, Channel, Engulfing, MovingAverage, OBV, OpenChase, OpenContinue, Pattern, RangeStop, RSI, Star, Stochastic, StopGain, ThreeMethods, TrailStop

    public abstract class StrategyPlugin
extends Plugin
implements DataRequirer
    Abstract class for strategy plug-in.

    • Field Detail

      • p_Within_Gap

        protected double p_Within_Gap
        Maximum open gap to continue on the previous session. 0 means never continue, >= 1 means always continue.

      • p_Active

        protected boolean p_Active
        Is the plug-in active.
